ExerciseRule.Name: EXO1
ExerciseRule.name: Exercise 1 : Easy sports rehabilitation
ExerciseRule.description: The first exercise involves specific left and right arm positions. The second involves head exercise.

rule.Description: Move your left elbow between 90 and 150 degrees and your right elbow between 300 and 20 degrees.
Keep your neck and head in a position where the angle is between 75 and 100 degrees.
Move your right shoulder between -15 and 15 degrees, and your right elbow between 75 and 105 degrees.
Perform an exercise related to the left leg by keeping the angle between the left hip and knee between 180 and 220 degrees.
